entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
